T02D2948:27a-0: @27a * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2948:27a-1: dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa yab yum gnyis
T02D2948:27a-2: su med pa'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur bar 'dod
T02D2948:27a-3: pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas gnas
T02D2948:27a-4: khang yid dang mthun par sa'i cho ga la sogs
T02D2948:27a-6: dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa yab yum gyi dkyil 'khor bzhengs te /
T02D2948:27a-7: sa stegs gru bzhi pa me long gi ngos ltar byas la thig btab la tshon dgye ste /
T02D2948:27a-8: dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa dkar po //
T02D2948:27a-9: mu khyud ser po mdud rtse gsum pas bskor ba /
T02D2948:27a-10: de'i phyi rim padma bcu drug pa dmar po /
T02D2948:27a-11: mu khyud ser po phur bus bskor ba /
T02D2948:27a-12: gru chad ljang gu mu khyud dang bcas pa mtha' ma me ris bskor ba /
T02D2948:27a-13: grva rnams su bum pa bzang po bri bar bya'o//
T02D2948:27a-14: de ltar bris la dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' ma rnams
T02D2948:27a-15: su shu gu brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bskor ba gzugs
T02D2948:27a-16: so // de dag kyang ras kyi skud pa sgril mas sprel lo //
T02D2948:27a-17: mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i bum pa gnyis la rgyan
T02D2948:27a-18: thams cad kyis brgyan pa 'khor lo dang padma'i steng
T02D2948:27a-19: du gzhag go // bum pa gnyis la yang dar tshon sna lngas sprel lo //
T02D2948:27a-20: dkyil 'khor gyi khor khor yug tu rtsva ku sha
T02D2948:27a-21: gsar pa bting ba'i steng du spos chu dang 'o
T02D2948:27a-23: de nas khrus kyi cho ga nas byung ba bzhin
T02D2948:27a-24: du nye reg dang 'thor 'thung la sogs pa byas
T02D2948:27a-25: la bdag nyid lag pa gnyis khong stong du sbyar
T02D2948:27a-26: la mthe bong gnyis bslang la mthe'u chung nang du
T02D2948:27a-27: bskum la / aom ma h'a yaksha se n'a pa ta ye badzra p'a ni h'um phat /
T02D2948:27a-28: ces brgya rtsa brgyad brjod pas rdo rje rnam par
T02D2948:27a-29: 'joms pa sku mdog ser po rgyan sna tshogs pas
T02D2948:27a-30: brgyan pa / dar gyi cod pan dang mu tig gi dra bas brgyan pa /
T02D2948:27a-31: dbu la rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas kyis brgyan pa /
T02D2948:27b-0: @27b thugs ka nas khro chung me ltar 'bar ba /
T02D2948:27b-1: dpag tu med pa 'phro ba yab zhal bgrad ljags
T02D2948:27b-2: 'gyu ba phyag g-yas bum pa'i steng na khro bo'i
T02D2948:27b-4: g-yon rdo rje dang lcags kyu lhan cig tu 'dzin pa bskyed do //
T02D2948:27b-5: de nas lag pa'i sor mo bsnol srin lag gnyis bsgrengs la mthe bong dang /
T02D2948:27b-7: aom badzra dha ra tishtha tishtha h'um phat /
T02D2948:27b-8: ces brjod pas yum lu gu rgyud ma sku mdog
T02D2948:27b-9: dmar mo rgyan sna tshogs pas brgyan pa g-yas lcags
T02D2948:27b-10: sgrog rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan pa bsnams te
T02D2948:27b-11: yab la 'khyud pa g-yon bdud rtsi'i bum pas chu
T02D2948:27b-12: rgyun 'bebs pa yab kyi bum pa dang gnyis med
T02D2948:27b-13: du bskyed do // de nas sgrub pa po dam
T02D2948:27b-14: tshig dang ldan pa bzhis phyogs bzhi nas mchod pa
T02D2948:27b-15: dang bstod pa byas la bgegs zhi bar bya ba'i
T02D2948:27b-16: don du gtor ma re re btang /
T02D2948:27b-17: de nas yab yum gyi ye shes sems dpa' la
T02D2948:27b-18: dmigs la shug pa re la rgyud re bton la
T02D2948:27b-19: / g-yas nas gcig cig la bskor ba /
T02D2948:27b-20: de ltar bzhi rdzogs pa dang re re la dbang du gyur pa'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2948:27b-21: de'i du ba la slob ma bdugs te khrus re yang bya'o //
T02D2948:27b-22: de nas dbang lugs bzhin du bskur ro //
T02D2948:27b-27: slob mas bla ma la yon dbul lo //
T02D2948:27b-28: yab yum gnyis pa'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba
T02D2948:27b-29: bde sbyin dam pa zhes bya ba dpal mar me
